info.name: NexSentia - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for NexSentia Platform - Organizational & Business Weak-Signal Detection

Includes: Authentication, Users, Tenants, Audit, Jira, Slack, Teams, ServiceNow, Privacy, and KPI Dashboard

request.description: Register as a new analyst. Automatically creates a new organization (tenant) and assigns ANALYST role. Each analyst gets their own isolated workspace for monitoring organizational health.
Login with email and password. System automatically identifies the user's organization.

Get privacy guarantees: fully anonymized, no personal identification, no data storage, ephemeral processing
Get compliance status for SOC2, GDPR, HIPAA, and CCPA
